testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.19 [Need to Share Section Timing Patterns] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Green Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Red Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pedestrian Clearance Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Steady-dont-walk Duration - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Sequence Information - Section Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Section Timing Pattern Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.15.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 16 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N104R1109_Send_Section_Timing_Pattern_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 17 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.1 VERIFY that element sectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg exists.
Step 17.2 VERIFY that element organization-information exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.3 VERIFY that element section-id exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.4 VERIFY that element section-timing-pattern-id exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.5 VERIFY that element section-cycle-length exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item

Step 17.6 VERIFY that element intersection-id exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing
Step 17.7 VERIFY that element cycle-length exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing
Step 17.8 VERIFY that element offset-time exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing

Step 17.9 VERIFY that element phase-identifier exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 17.10 VERIFY that element coordinated-phase exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 17.11 VERIFY that element split-mode exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases

Step 17.12 VERIFY that element phase-split exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.13 IF TMDD_N104R1117_Restrictions___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.13.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.14 IF TMDD_N104R1118_Description_of_Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.14.1 VERIFY that element section-timing-pattern-name exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.15 IF TMDD_N104R1119_Maximum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.15.1 VERIFY that element maximum-green-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.16 IF TMDD_N104R1120_Minimum_Green_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.16.1 VERIFY that element minimum-green-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.17 IF TMDD_N104R1121_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.17.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-clearance-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.18 IF TMDD_N104R1122_Vehicle_Red_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.18.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-red-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.19 IF TMDD_N104R1123_Minimum_Walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.19.1 VERIFY that element minimum-walk-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.20 IF TMDD_N104R1124_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.20.1 VERIFY that element pedestrian-clearance-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.21 IF TMDD_N104R1125_Steady_dont_walk_Duration___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.21.1 VERIFY that element steady-dont-walk-duration exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 17.22 IF TMDD_N104R1126_Phase_Sequence_Information___Section_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 17.22.1 VERIFY that element sequence-information exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item.intersection-tp-list.intersection-timing
Step 17.23 IF TMDD_N104R1127_Section_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 17.23.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of SectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.signal-section-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 17.24 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
